notes:
### v1.9.0
#### NEW FEATURES
- updated meter for thaemine patch
- added gem display for transformation and identity skills (surge, demonic impulse sh, etc.)
- added new option to split rdps into parties

![rdps_party](https://i.imgur.com/2mJCuuQ.png)

- added new columns for rdps that show the actual % of your damage that came from all, supp, or dps
- added new tooltips to help clarify meaning of sSyn%

sCon% (Support Contribution) Tooltip Example

![rdps_tooltips](https://i.imgur.com/7yi88Rc.png)

sSyn% (Support Synergy) Tooltip Example

![rdps_tooltips](https://i.imgur.com/O1UQCRR.png)

#### BUG FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
- improved db optimization button (settings > database > optimize database)
- fixed crashes under certain conditions
- boss damage only will be forced on every app start (please let me know if that is an issue for you)


### RDPS NOTE: if you or anyone in your raid swaps gear presets, please wait up to 20s before pulling for the stats server to get updated gear info


full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
